Detailed Description

Cube map class for precise environment mapping.

This class implements more precise environment mapping, taking advantage of the GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_ARB extension to avoid the discontinuity observed in standard environment mapping. The class members are the mesh over which the cube map will be applied and an array with six images.
